title: 3daxialize
description: Read and write dataset as new dataset with data brick oriented as axial slices.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Use specified prefix for the new dataset. Default is 'axialize'.

sagittal.title: Sagittal slice order flag
sagittal.description: Write dataset in sagittal slice order.

coronal.title: Coronal slice order flag
coronal.description: Write dataset in coronal slice order.

axial.title: Axial slice order flag
axial.description: Write dataset in axial slice order, the default orientation.

orient_code.title: Orientation code
orient_code.description: Orientation code for output. 3 letters: one from {R,L}, {A,P}, {I,S}.

frugal.title: Frugal flag
frugal.description: Write data as it is rotated, saving memory. Not available with NIFTI datasets.
